context: A known credential theft tool `mimikatz.exe` was executed from the device with URL `vnevado-dc.vnevado.alpineskihouse.co` and IP address `65.233.23.156` to dump users' credentials. This incident triggered a malicious credential theft tool execution alert on 2024-07-04. Shortly after, there was a sign-in attempt with a deceptive user account detected, indicating that a potential attacker might be using a fake or decoy account to perform various attack activities including lateral movement and accessing sensitive data.
question: Can you identify the security identifier (SID) of the deceptive user account involved in the sign-in attempt?
solution_steps: A known credential theft tool was executed using the account `tgs2z`.
There was a sign-in attempt using a deceptive user account with the name `kyleg`.
Another sign-in attempt was detected using a deceptive user account with the SID `S-0-6-5`.
